videos.headline: IU's Scott punches it in for six
videos.description: Stevie Scott's 1-yard touchdown give Indiana an early lead over Ball State.

videos.headline: IU's Ramsey scampers in for a TD
videos.description: Peyton Ramsey takes it in himself for a 5-yard touchdown run to increase Indiana's lead over Ball State..

videos.headline: Walker Jr. spins his way in for a TD
videos.description: Ronnie Walker Jr. spins and lunges his way in for an 18-yard touchdown to extend Indiana's lead over Ball State.

videos.headline: Ball State's Gilbert breaks off a 27-yard TD run
videos.description: James Gilbert finds a big hole and scores a 27-yard touchdown to cut Ball State's the deficit vs Indiana.

videos.headline: IU's Scott drags Ball State defenders in for a TD
videos.description: Stevie Scott runs through three Ball State players and takes them in for an 11-yard touchdown.
